Bought two Oracle Book from China-Pub

Posted by Vincent on June 16, 2008

I bought two book from China-Pub. I remember I have bought about 10 books from the web site. At first, I think I can pay the book when I have recived the book is very good. And now, there are more benefits, for emample: the carriage is free, and the price is more cheap than buying from the book store.

The two books is:

基于成本的Oracle优化法则 It is a good book and it maybe a little hard for me now, but I think the book is very good.
构建Oracle高可用环境:企业级高可用数据库架构、实战与经验总结 (ITPUB版主作品) This book's author is Peer Chen who is the DBA from TaoBao.

And I buy two gift by a low price: china-pub定制精美泰迪小熊 and ★新款大号★CHINA-PUB定制精美泰迪熊.
